梣字的基本解释

梣
chén
白蜡树，落叶乔木，可放养白蜡虫，树皮可入药，称秦皮，木材坚硬，可做器物。

梣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cén］
［《廣韻》鋤針切，平侵，崇。］
［《廣韻》昨淫切，平侵，從。］
亦作“橬2”。
木名。木犀科。落叶乔木。木材坚韧，供制器具。枝条可编筐。树皮称“秦皮”，中医用为清热剂。树可放养白蜡虫以取白蜡，也称白蜡树。

梣字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　梣； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页530第06
【集韻】【類篇】?咨林切，音祲。或作?。【說文】靑皮木。【淮南子·俶眞訓】梣木色靑翳，此治目之藥也。【本草】秦皮，一名梣皮，一名石檀。【唐本草】樹似檀，葉取皮水漬碧色，書紙靑色。　又【廣韻】昨淫切，音?。義同。【集韻】江南樊雞木也。　又【唐韻】鉏針切【集韻】鉏簪切，?音岑。義同。【類篇】栫也。

梣字的起名意思

木名。木犀科，落叶乔木。

梣
Basic explanation of words
梣
chén
Ash trees, deciduous trees, can be stocked with white wax insects, and the bark can be used as medicine. It is called Qin Bark. The wood is hard and can be used as utensils.
梣
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cén］
["Guangyun" Needle cutting, flat invasion, Chong. ]
["Guangyun" yesterday lewdly, flatly invaded, from. ]
Also known as "橬2".
Wooden name. Oleaceae. Deciduous trees. The wood is tough and is used for making utensils. The branches can be woven baskets. The bark is called "Qinpi", and it is used as a heat-clearing agent in traditional Chinese medicine. The tree can be stocked with white wax insects to get white wax, also known as white wax tree.
梣
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　梣; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 530 06
[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Consulting Lin cut, the sound is awkward. Or for?. [Said the text] Takipi wood. [Huainanzi·Fei Xun] Ash wood color, this medicine is also used to cure the eyes. 【Materia Medica】Qinpi, one dingpi, one stone sandalwood. [Tang Materia Medica] The tree resembles sandalwood, the leaves are peeled off and the water is stained in blue, and the book paper is pale in color.　[Guang Yun] Yesterday's lewd cut, sound?. The same meaning. 【Ji Yun】Jian Mu Ye in Fan, Jiangnan.　[Tang Yun] 鉏针切 [Ji Yun] 鉏簪切,? Yin Cen. The same meaning. 【Classes】Kiyaya.
